Platform SDK Java 9.0 API Reference
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger

  • Packages that use com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger 
    Package Description
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.application
    This package provides helper components for connectivity with Genesys Configuration Framework.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration.log
    Dedicated package for CME Application Logging Options configuration support.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger
    This package provides support of Genesys LMS files and LMS events logging.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.impl
    This package contains internal functionality of LMS Logging and Message Server delivery subsystems.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.jul
    This package contains java.util.logging based implementation of LmsEventLogger and correspondent LmsLoggerFactory.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.log4j
    This package contains Log4j v1.x implementation of LmsEventLogger and correspondent LmsLoggerFactory.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.log4j2
    This package contains Log4j2 implementation of LmsEventLogger and correspondent LmsLoggerFactory.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.slf4j
    This package contains Slf4j implementation of LmsEventLogger and correspondent LmsLoggerFactory.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.log4j2
    This package contains a set of AppTemplate classes related to Log4j v2 support.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.application 
    Class Description
    LmsEventLogger
    Facade interface for LMS Events logging.
    It allows applications to generate LMS Events with or without specific LMS templates enumerations.
    LmsLoggerFactory
    Abstract factory class for LMS event loggers.
    It's the entry point of the LMS logging functionality.
    LmsMessageConveyor
    Container of LMS events templates with correspondent LMS file(s) localization.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration.log 
    Class Description
    LmsLogLevel
    Log levels enumeration declarations specific for Genesys Message Server and Genesys LMS files specifications.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger 
    Class Description
    ILoggerEx
    Extension of PSDK Common logging interface with methods named in style of common logging interfaces like Log4j2.
    LmsEventLogger
    Facade interface for LMS Events logging.
    It allows applications to generate LMS Events with or without specific LMS templates enumerations.
    LmsLoadException
    Exception representing errors in LMS file reading or parsing.
    LmsLoggerFactory
    Abstract factory class for LMS event loggers.
    It's the entry point of the LMS logging functionality.
    LmsLoggerFactory.AbstractFactoryBuilder  
    LmsLoggerFactory.WrappedLoggerFactory
    The LmsLoggerFactory wrapper to provide application with wrapped LmsEventLogger's.
    LmsLogLevel
    Log levels enumeration declarations specific for Genesys Message Server and Genesys LMS files specifications.
    LmsMessageConveyor
    Container of LMS events templates with correspondent LMS file(s) localization.
    LmsMessageConveyor.Builder
    Builder for LmsMessageConveyor component.
    LmsMessageTemplate
    Interface for representation of a GCTI LMS event entry.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.lmslogger.impl 
    Class Description
    AbstractLmsEventLogger
    Abstract base class with common methods implementation of LmsEventLogger interface.
    ILoggerEx
    Extension of PSDK Common logging interface with methods named in style of common logging interfaces like Log4j2.
    LmsEventLogger
    Facade interface for LMS Events logging.
    It allows applications to generate LMS Events with or without specific LMS templates enumerations.
    LmsFileHeader
    LMS file header information containing the same fields as the header of LMS file does.
    LmsLoadException
    Exception representing errors in LMS file reading or parsing.
    LmsLoggerFactory
    Abstract factory class for LMS event loggers.
    It's the entry point of the LMS logging functionality.
    LmsLoggerFactory.AbstractFactoryBuilder  
    LmsLogLevel
    Log levels enumeration declarations specific for Genesys Message Server and Genesys LMS files specifications.
    LmsMessageConveyor
    Container of LMS events templates with correspondent LMS file(s) localization.
    LmsMessageTemplate
    Interface for representation of a GCTI LMS event entry.
